participants.name: Matthew Shanker
participants.description: Senior Site Reliability Engineer at Socrata

messages.message: So Leah tells me that she'd rather not have certain distractions in her life right now and that she's made it clear that you are one of those distractions. I'd appreciate it if you would back off and let her do her thing. Thanks.

Brian
Hack every industry I need your brain on this.  Now you know as much as I do.
https://www.gatesnotes.com/Books/Mindset-The-New-Psychology-of-Success
What You Believe Affects What You Achieve
Bill Gates reviews the book “Mindset” by author Carol Dweck.
gatesnotes.com

Brian
I need your brains!  We are on another level!  This is all a game!

Brian
I completely lost my mind last week. You always stood our as someone I admire because you seem to have all your crap figured out. I appreciate you.
